contentrichtext.text: This article is about the [[demographics|demographic]] features of the [[population]] of [[Montserrat]], including [[population density]], [[Ethnic group|ethnicity]], education level, health of the populace, economic status, religious affiliations and other aspects of the population. == CIA World Factbook demographic statistics == The following demographic statistics are from the [[CIA World Factbook]], unless otherwise indicated. '''Population:''' 8,400 (2002 estimate) <br>''note:'' an estimated 8,000 refugees left the island following the resumption of volcanic activity in July 1995; many have returned. Pre-eruption population was 13,000 in 1994. '''Age structure:''' <br>''0-14 years:'' 23.4% (male 1,062; female 1,041) <br>''15-64 years:'' 65.3% (male 2,805; female 3,066) <br>''65 years and over:'' 11.4% (male 537; female 484) (2003 est.) '''Median age:''' <br>''total:'' 27.8 years <br>''male:'' 27.7 years <br>''female:'' 27.9 years (2002) '''Population growth rate:''' 4.5% (2003 est.) '''Birth rate:''' 17.57 births/1,000 population (2003 est.) '''Death rate:''' 7.34 deaths/1,000 population (2003 est.) '''Net migration rate:''' 195.35 migrant(s)/1,000 population (2000 est.) '''Sex ratio:''' <br>''at birth:'' 1.05 male(s)/female <br>''under 15 years:'' 1.02 male(s)/female <br>''15-64 years:'' 0.91 male(s)/female <br>''65 years and over:'' 1.11 male(s)/female <br>''total population:'' 0.96 male(s)/female (2000 est.) '''Infant mortality rate:''' <br>''total:'' 7.77 deaths/1,000 live births (2003 est.) <br>''female:'' 6.43 deaths/1,000 live births <br>''male:'' 9.05 deaths/1,000 live births '''Life expectancy at birth:''' <br>''total population:'' 78.36 years <br>''male:'' 76.24 years <br>''female:'' 80.59 years (2003 est.) '''Total fertility rate:''' 1.8 children born/woman (2003 est.) '''HIV/AIDS - adult prevalence rate:''' NA% '''HIV/AIDS - people living with HIV/AIDS:''' NA '''HIV/AIDS - deaths:''' NA '''Nationality:''' <br>''noun:'' Montserratian(s) <br>''adjective:'' Montserratian '''Ethnic groups:''' black, white - mainly of British, Irish and African descent '''Religions:''' Anglican, Methodist, Roman Catholic, Pentecostal, Seventh-Day Adventist, other Christian denominations '''Languages:''' English '''Literacy:''' <br>''definition:'' age 15 and over has ever attended school <br>''total population:'' 97% <br>''male:'' 97% <br>''female:'' 97% (1970 est.) :''See also :'' [[Montserrat]]:'' [[Montserratian British]] ==Source== *[https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/geos/mh.html CIA World Factbook] {{Navboxes |list = {{British peoples |state=autocollapse}} {{North America topic|Demographics of}} }} [[Category:Montserratian society]] [[Category:Geography of Montserrat]]
